name: clayton west
text: Professional and knowledgeable service from a man that's been  drilling wells for over 40 years.   We couldn't be happier with the results.

name: Alaina Samuels
text: Pat Hurst was excellent.  He returned my phone call the same day and answered all of my questions.  He was able to work us into his schedule in a very reasonable time and was very professional throughout the whole process.  Pat is very experienced in his field, and he was extremely patient and made sure we had everything we needed.  We had a wonderful experience with Hurst Well Drilling and would highly recommend them to anyone.

name: Mary Knoechel
text:
We hired Pat Hurst to dig a well for us back in 2013.
We blindly trusted him to do the right thing.
He did not wire our pump properly causing our pump to fry-up. We were without water for an entire year.
Be aware! Look elsewhere.

text: Very Knowledgeable and friendly. They have all rain bird items and  irrigation supplies . They even have landscape lighting. Very reasonable pricing. Hope they are open on weekends too

name: Nathan Capps
text: Great team that always gets you what you need. Prices are always lower than other distributors and the knowledge on parts is unsurpassed!! Grady, Taylor, and Brent make buying our irrigation parts and equipment a breeze and conversational!! Two thumbs way up!! 5 Stars across the board!!

name: Popi Bear (PopiShop)

name: Keith Krininger
text: We would like to acknowledge what a wonderful experience we had working with Alabama Landscape Creations.  Their management is knowledgeable, friendly, and prompt.  We had a large project with a large seawall, double waterfall, and 2 flagstone decks, not to mention the beautiful  landscaping job they did.  We get compliments every time someone visits, even from boaters passing by.    Most importantly, they stand behind their work and if you have a problem, they will fix it.  We highly recommend them!!  Keith and Kay K.

name: David Wilson
text: ALC came up with a plan that solved a very challenging erosion problem on my steeply sloped lot that fit my budget, looks fantastic and was completed ahead of schedule.  Jake and everyone I met was very professional and I recommend them highly.

name: Brad Goddard
text:
A good selection of hardscape materials, loose stone, and plants.  Prices on par with other landscape supplies.  Usually just enough staff to help you out.  I have never had to wait more than 1 customer which I am good with.
Fair warning, 119 is becoming very busy these days and it can be very hard to turn left out of their drive at some times of the day, especially in a tractor trailer.

name: some body
text: Don’t worry about good service here if you are of color. You will get overlooked. Doesn’t matter if you were there first.

name: Billy Newsome
text: I come here on a regular, and every time, the crew there is helpful, and patient with me. Keep Up The Outstanding Work!

name: Terry Shadrix
text: Great staff always friendly and eager to help

name: David and Chris Marshall
text: Helpful and knowledgeable folks with very good inventory of plants, parts, and chemical supplies.

name: Dennis Held
text: First and last visit to SiteOne. Left out back for someone to load and associate never called for anyone! Total time 1hour for 6 bags of mulch! Very unorganized and appeared not well managed!

name: yllib taog
text: Terrible place to deliver. Plan on spending the day here waiting for them to unload.

name: rln Krutsch
text: Employees are very helpful and knowledgeable. Good selections of plants. I love that place its like candy factory but plants.

name: Martin Bachtel
text:
Primarily they sell wholesale to landscapers but they also cater to retail customers.  The majority of their business comes from landscapers and contractors. The place is huge, about 10 acres, and you can drive the property in your vehicle instead of walking it.   The staff is mostly college horticulture graduates or seasoned veterans in the business, and very professional, as opposed to Hanna’s Nursery down the street, which is mostly teenagers still in high school hired as cheap labor to BS customers, with zero knowledge of horticulture. It all starts with the excellent leadership and the rest of the staff is reflected by that.   They sell: trees, shrubs, perennials, annuals, mulch, pine straw, bulk materials like top soil and sand, several types of stone and rock for hardscape projects, irrigation supplies, drainage supplies, construction materials like cement , a wide array of tools for landscaping and beyond, safety equipment, anything that has to do with agricultural chemical applications, bottled water and sodas!
They do close at noon on Saturdays so make sure you get up early that day so you don’t have to settle going to Hanna’s instead and cursing yourself as you spread their dirty, trashy pine straw

name: Jaden stidham
text: Best overall selection

name: Dewayne Coleman
text: Andy was great helping us pick out our plants and rocks

name: J L
text: Outstanding is an understatement for Site One.  The staff is very knowledgeable, friendly and provide exceptional customer service.  A first-stop must for all landscape and irrigation needs.  They treat you right!

text: Awful experience. They told me I could load my truck with the stones I needed then when I was going to pay they said they sold them and the manager (Justin) said they would have to unload them. Worst service I’ve seen in my life. Buyer beware.

name: Matthew Glidden
text: They were great and very responsive to get materials to the job site but hopefully you order EXACTLY what you need because I’m now on my fifth call trying to get a pallet of blocks picked up so I can pour a new driveway and have been told multiple times that I’d get a call when the driver was on his way to pick up the extra.  I’m now being ghosted when I call and I’ve yet to get a voicemail call back.  Last one I talked to was John.

name: JUAN MIGUEL DIAZ

name: Darrel McColgan
text: Howdy.....I've been running an Irrigation Repair company in the greater Huntsville area for 20 years now.   I have been using Site One and it's previous name sakes (Century Rain Aid and John Deere) since 2000.  The name of the company (ownership) may have changed over the years but it has always consistently been my go to place.  Several of the current employees have been around for a quite a number of years.  The knowledge that they know and share is invaluable to the everyday needs of the landscape and irrigation industry layman.  If they don't have it they find a way to get it.  Their prices are competitive and they carry a variety of name brand parts.  During these trying times of COVID it's good to know that they are still trying to meet our demands and needs with the manufacturing industries struggles to keep up with new inventory.  Kudos to the whole staff at SiteOne for making it a little easier to continue to operate with limited resources at this time.

name: Tom Lamar
text: Everything  for your yard. Very helpful staff

name: Micah Chambers
text: Carter and his team at Site One are unparalleled; they go above and beyond to take care of my team's needs each and every time. Robert in the nursery will be one of the friendliest and most helpful individuals you will ever deal with in the commercial landscape world.

text: Always on top of your needs and eager to see them met asap. I dig these folks, should get the Michelin Star of Landscape Supply.

name: Bruce Crawley
text: Had a tax of for school system did not take it to lazy to do the paper work

name: Gordon Banks
text:
>  I believe this company needs to improve its customer communications policies. They showed up late (without calling) to give me an estimate, and then showed up unannounced the day they came to work. But then things took a surprising turn..
>   They were hired to fell one tree and heavily trim the lower branches of another. To save money and to give me a project involving strenuous exercise, they were not required to do any cleanup work. When they asked about my cleanup plans, I mentioned using my ATV trailer to move the debris to the street for pickup by the city. At their suggestion I moved the trailer into the work area. Suddenly the logs and branches magically found their way onto the trailer until it was full, with the remainder piled neatly nearby. Despite not being paid for it, they worked hard to minimize the cleanup work remaining for me, a fat 74 year old retired soldier.
>  It was also interesting and entertaining to watch their tree climber work. He knew exactly where and how to make cuts to have the pieces fall right where he wanted them. And while 20+ feet up into the tree being trimmed, he asked me over and over what else I wanted cut. He never suggested being done until I was satisfied.
>   Finally, when the work was done, they did a last minute walk-around to check for any tools left behind, and to pick up more debris so I wouldn't have to.
>   The team's work (and work ethics) more than made up for the early communications problems. I highly  recommend Veterans Lawn Care for lawn and tree work.

resp.text: Mr. Banks, thank you Sir for taking the time out to give us such a detailed honest review! We take all feedback, positive and negative, so we can adjust fire accordingly. We did forget that we were supposed to text instead of calling but we will be more detailed in our system to prevent this. We are happy that you were satisfied with our work, our teams strive for these 5 Star jobs. We will be passing this review out to the team! Thank you for your business and mostly thank you for your military service!

name: Michele McQueeney
text:
The team did a great job of cleaning out the flower beds, pruning bushes, removing the ivy and overgrowth. I really appreciated them asking questions and making sure I was happy with the work being done.
I will be using them again and recommend them to others.

name: Jim Blake
text:
These guys are awesome. Highly knowledgeable, professional, hard working and a heck of a lot of fun to watch if you have the free time.

I had an oak tree that needed to come down. It was between the house, a garage and a driveway with a fence right under it. They had to take the whole tree down in pieces. It was a 3 day process.

I would recommend them for any difficult task because, THEY ARE UP TO IT!

name: Katrina Wintermyer
text: The owner was very nice and did our free estimate personally. The workers showed up and the work was done very quickly and effectively. I love my new yard. We got a full landscaping of our front yard and it was exactly what I envisioned.

resp.text: Ms. Wintermyer, Thank you for an awesome review! I will let the team know this, we appreciate your business!

name: Jeri H
text:
Wonderful experience with Jarom today.
Very professional & did a great job!!

name: Karen French
text: Thank you - Randy, David, and Joe for planting my beautiful 15 gal Cherry Laurels in my backyard to hide a fence. Veteran's Lawn Care has the expertise of design and knowledge of plants along with hard working good people!!  Very pleased with their work. A shout-out to Amanda for helping redesign our yard. I will be back!!

resp.text: Mrs. French, we enjoyed your project and glad that you will get the green back drop that you were wanting! I'll will pass this feedback to the team. Thank you for taking time out to leave us such a positive review!

name: Emma Hammonds
text: It was good. Nice to mert some of the staff.

name: Hannah Moon
text: These guys are amazing! They cleaned up my flower beds, removed shrubs, and placed new mulch down. I had to get new plants that I was not expecting since it was discovered that the old shrubs were diseased, but this was not an issue. I am so glad that I got them to come out. They are professional, and I felt like I was cared for the entire time. Definitely talk to them before you get anyone else to do your landscape work.

resp.text:
Ms. Moon,

We are so happy to hear this! Thank you for your review of our company and the team. If there is anything else you need please don't hesitate!

name: Cara Stein
text: My yard was a jungle/disaster when I called these guys. They came and got everything looking tidy and sharp, and it was so fast! I felt cared for the entire time the guys were here, and they obviously take great pride in doing excellent work. I’m so glad I went with Veteran’s, and I’ll be calling them for more work in the future. Excellent job.

resp.text:
Ms. Stein, we appreciate you taking time to write such an awesome review. Our teams enjoy providing services to our customers and it makes it so fulfilling to hear how happy you are! I will definitely be passing this on to our team that was on your property.
-Jacob

name: Dave Kimzey
text: Veteran's Lawn Care & Landscaping did a fantastic job with our landscaping! They completed a rock border with landscaping rock and it looks really good, better than expected. Jacob, Amanda, and Randy were excellent to work with and we couldn't be happier! Thank you very much!

resp.text: Thank you Mr. Kimzey for this review. We appreciate awesome customers like you and your wife! Mostly, thank you and your wife for your service!!

name: Danny Snodgrass
text: Veterans lawn care is by far the best lawn care company I have dealt with. Their employees are very courteous and through. After mowing they clean the side walks and then follow up to make sure we are satisfied. They also have cut some trees for us and disposed of the debris and then raked the surroundings. Love their work ethic.

resp.text:
Thank you Sir for posting this, I've enjoyed our relationship with you and your family over the years!
-Jacob

name: Mary Katherine Viall
text: First, I had tried contacting several lawn services to get estimates on my yard and even made plans with no- shows. Veteran's Lawn Care was professional, timely, answered my questions, and gave me what I was wanting. Michael was great in planing out the landscape, and each crew that came out to complete the project worked hard and were friendly and professional. They even came out on a Saturday to complete the project. My husband and I were happy with the services.

resp.text:
Mrs. Viall,
Thank you for your positive review. You and your husband have been awesome customers of ours! I'll pass this on to our team and let them know we have another happy customer!

name: Joyner Livingston
text: Installed a French drain and restocked a flowerbed with new topsoil. Installed shrubs. Shortly after the shrubs were installed I asked them to take a look at one that looked like it was not going to make it. Shortly meaning a few weeks after. These were full grown very expensive shrubs and they've ignored my calls for almost a year now.

name: Spencer M
text:
I inquired into their services recently and was told that they wont be able to service my yard due to not being able to utilize push mow in the back yard of about 25x25 size, not very large at all. I asked/called (repeatedly) for a rep to come out and get with me to get an estimate, I wasn't even sure it needed to be pushed at all I just assumed given my gate size. I wanted someone, a supposed professional, to tell me what they thought. However, after just simply driving by quickly out front of my yard they surmised (and didn't actually call to follow up) that they wouldn't be able to service my yard. It must be nice that you have plenty of business that you can not only turn away potential new customers but also treat them poorly with poor follow through and lackluster effort. I understand the eb and flow of your operations and how you can't push mow entire yards. I wasn't sure that it required that and if it did I would of possibly still been interested in the front yard being serviced which can be completed with a riding mower. You should evaluate your business operations and how you portray the business as a veteran ran organization (with I'm assuming good order and discipline, integrity, and work ethic) because I don't see that in your company right now.

Again to be clear your representative that "stopped by" rolled by for 20 seconds (we are all working from home and I watched him) and surely couldn't have gathered a full sight picture. Which is weird because I asked  your office rep if I could safely talk with him (at distance) and was told that wouldn't be an issue, clear lack of follow through there as well. Also, I was interested in other services your company might have provided but in light of this entire process lacking professionalism and follow through I wouldn't be confident in ANY work you could provide. You (the owner) should take a reflective look at your operation, from the person that takes the calls to the rep that spent 20 seconds here from the road, and see where to improve.

resp.text: Mr. McGalliard, I appreciate you bringing this to my attention. I take all reviews (positive and negative) to help better our company and our operations. I will meet with the team and let them know how this has impacted our company. Please let us know if there is anything we can do to remedy this relationship!

name: Joy Watts
text:
The guys showed up and completed the job way faster than we could have ever expected. not only did they complete the job quickly, they were professional and efficient. They also did a heck of a clean-up job!
Update 5/11/20:
We initially gave them 5 stars because we thought they ground the tree stumps, per the estimate they gave, but their clean-up job actually just consisted of them putting a lot of brush over the stumps instead. We went out a couple of weeks later to work on leveling the area and realized that all three tree stumps were still there. I have sent an email and called and left a voicemail, and have heard nothing back from the company. I understand that companies get busy during this season but they responded rather quickly to secure the job and aren't responding at all now to complete it and it's quite frustrating. All I want is for them to complete the work they were paid to complete. Doesn't seem like too much to ask.
Update 7/1/2020:
We are still waiting for our stump grinding that was supposedly scheduled a month ago. Every time we call, we are told that we are on the stump grinding list, as if our job that has already been paid for does not take precedent over new jobs that are bringing in new income. Very disappointing to say the least.
7/2/2020: We were able to have the stump grinding completed today and everything looks much better. I believe that the coronavirus situation threw everything off and, with that being said, the company does do quality work. I do believe, however, I will wait until things are relatively back to normal before thinking about reaching out for any additional services.

resp.text: Mrs. Watts, I apologize about dropping the ball on getting your stumps removed. We somehow weren't tracking that this was included in your estimate. We have you scheduled!

name: Doug Bishop
text:
I am not one to leave reviews for anything but my situation warrants sharing for anyone searching for lawn service.

On 3/30/20 they mowed my lawn when it was too wet and left ruts in my lawn, my neighbors lawn and damaged my fence and down spout.
They did eventually come out to sod the ruts however my fence and downspout have not been fixed and have since stopped communicating.

4/13/20 - received an email stating that they have the damage report and “are working on fixing it”

4/27/20 - I offered to take care of the damage myself if they would mulch and/or lay sod in bare areas of my back yard. My offer was declined and again said they would repair the fence and downspout.

4/30/20 - scheduled to make repairs on 5/5/20

5/5/20 - no show with no communication until I asked why they didn’t come. Told they did not come due to rain and rescheduled for 5/13/20.

5/12/20 - sent text asking if they were still planning to come and never replied.

5/13/20 - no show with no communication

- Followed up with a phone call a few weeks ago (don’t recall the date) and was told I would get a call back to reschedule the work.

It is now 6/7/20 with no call back and no repairs

name: Jauquin Holmes
text: VETERANS LAWN CARE is a one stop service, with knowledgeable and effective working persons. ERIC and Brandon get a shout out as well.  My lawn was very out of control due to COVID 19 and the lack of maintenance on my landscaping. They came out and kicked butt! Landscaping is much better and ready for the next phase in my plans and needs.

resp.text:
Mr. Holmes,

Thank you for your awesome review! We enjoyed getting your trees serviced and your landscape ready for the next phase. Ill pass it on to our team that you were happy with our services.

name: Kay Lewis
text: Initially I had issues with the terrain sloping that was done on our French drain. Many delays in getting back, some of which were due to Covid crisis. In the end, Randy and Erick came out and did a superb job. Very pleased.

resp.text:
Mrs. Lewis,
I'm glad we have resolved your issue!

name: aisha wright
text: Ellis serviced my lawn today and himself and the other guy did a great job. They communicated very well with me and got to every specific detail that I mentioned in advance. Before even mentioning those details again, they were already aware and prepared to do so. Thank you!

resp.text: Ms. Wright, thank you for such a positive review! I am glad that our team was able to proficiently provide you with customized services!

name: Petra
text: Josh and his crew came out 21 April 20 to install our flagstone patio and walkway and did a great job! The crew even gave us ideas for plants to put around our new patio. From start, with speaking to Amanda to finish with meeting Jacob as he did his final check on the project, was an easy and professional process. We definitely recommend Veteran’s Lawn Care & Landscaping for any of your landscaping needs.

resp.text: Ms. Petra, I appreciate you taking the time out to leave us such a positive review! I will make sure and let the team know that you were pleased with their work.

name: PJ French
text: If you want a project done right and on time and at a fair price, Veteran's is the choice.  These guys work their bums off and make sure you are satisfied.  I highly recommend Jacob and his crew.  You will not be disappointed with their service or product.

resp.text: Mr. Perry! Thank you for such an awesome review! This feedback makes a big difference for our team and company growth.

name: Mike King
text: The crew that did my work were great could not have asked for a better bunch of people to do the job. I will be using them agin.

resp.text:
Mr. King,
Thank you for your review, I will be passing this on to the tree team!

name: jwiswoss
text:
Today was the first cut and it looks fantastic!

Update: The last cut for my grass was back on 5/22. As of 7/11, they have not been to cut the grass. That is over a month and a half with no cut. I understand that there was some rain in June, but this is ridiculous. I’m not sure if they have too many customers or just forget my lawn. At first, back in June, I thought I missed an invoice and inquired about that. I didn’t get a direct answer, just that they were behind due to rain. This is unacceptable service.

resp.text:
We are glad to hear that we have another happy customer! Thank you for rating us!!

Update Response: I am sorry that  your lawn has been missed! I will look into this and get you taken care of. Sorry for any inconvenience we've caused.
-Jacob Leavitt

name: Nina Wesley
text: I spent 2000.00 with these people last year to have bushes removed, new ones installed and to have a tree removed and replaced.  They require that they choose the items you want.  The crepe myrtle they installed in my yard last year is nothing but tree stems this year.  I have called several times and was told by Amanda she would have Micheal come by at a specified date and time and look at everything and discuss it with me .  On the scheduled day, i received a 'Health Check' email from Amanda explaining that Micheal had come by earlier than anticipated and then she went on to explain what he found regarding my tree and the bushs.  First off, if he came by, i did not know anything about it because he surely did not ring my doorbell; Secondly, if he did come by, he trespassed onto my fenced in backyard to look at the tree.  I find this highly unacceptable. When i called these people last year, the owner Jacob came out, whom i consider the 'money man."  i explained to him that i dont have a green thumb at all and need some kind of consultation regarding what i need to do to get my yard up to speed.  All he proceeds to do is write down how much everything is going to cost me without allowing someone who knows about horticulture to come out and discuss with me first about what would be the proper plants i need based on my unique environment. Needless to say, i'm back at the drawing board, trying to find a landscaper who will listen to my cries of help and actually help me.  I certainly will not spend another dime with these people at Veterans Lawn Care!!

resp.text:
Ms. Wesley,
I am sorry to hear about your tree and shrubs. I explained that not having a watering system on your property could have negative effects on your flowerbeds due to our hot summers with long periods of no rain. We don't have a horticulturist on our team yet but you did correspond with our master gardener who provided you with options available at our local nurseries. We strive to achieve superior results in the Green Industry and I apologize your unhappy with our services. Please call us if we can make it right.
Very Respectfully,
-Jacob Leavitt

name: Tara Jean
text: This business bills for lawncare services they don’t provide! They are weeks behind on lawn services,  they do a horrible job edging and miss huge patches of grass. The receptionist is a horrible person, she’s nasty and rude to customers who call with questions about missed and scheduled services. Once she found out I was a Veteran she knew she couldn’t use the Veteran card as a crutch and an excuse for a poorly run business. They make excuse after excuse because they can’t keep up with their clients or even keep a schedule. Get your lawncare from any other provider!

resp.text: Ma'am we apologized for this and have done what we can to make this right.

name: Monica Snyder
text: As the neighbor of someone who used this company, I cannot speak of their services, but I can certainly attest to the lack of professionalism. While they were cutting my neighbors trees, part of one fell on part of my fence and damaged it. I was not upset, and as I told the owner, I understand, accidents happen. However, he wanted to do a patch job on my fence and I felt the length of the fence should be replaced to keep the fence uniform instead of part of it sticking out like a sore thumb, as was confirmed with my insurance company. So because he thought I was unreasonable he would not give me his insurance info. Poor business practices. Beware if you ever have issues with him, although I still appreciate his service to our country,I will at least give credit for that.

resp.text: Ms. Snyder, we attempted to repair the damaged fence with matching or new fencing but thought it was unreasonable to replace the entire fence line. Your husband and I agreed on what repairs were needed hours before your arrival. You then, approached irate by cussing and yelling at me in front of my employees. You stated that your adjuster would be in contact with us and I was willing to speak to him cordially but refused to engage any further especially after your husband started yelling with his fist clenched. We remained professional and courteous even while you were making a scene on our jobsite. I'm sorry that your fence was damaged and we are waiting to be contacted by your adjuster to see how we can move forward.

name: Michael Payne
text: Great work! Ellis serviced my lawn and it was quick and neat. Look forward to having this company for years to come!

resp.text: Mr. Payne, Thank you sir for the awesome review!

name: Edna Block
text:
Veterans Lawn Care is fabulous!!! We have had them cut down trees, trim bushes, remove leaves and they have been spraying for weeds for a couple of years. They do an excellent job and always come when they say they are.
They are professional and friendly and can do everything from planning you landscape design to cutting your grass!

resp.text: Mrs. Edna, thank you for taking the time out to leave us such an awesome review. You and David have been a blessing to our company!

name: mlob5704
text: Probably the best choice I’ve made in lawn care since I started hiring this kind of service. Ellis does a meticulous job and the lawn looks great!

resp.text: Thank you for leaving us this review! I will let the team know you were happy with our quality and service!

name: Linda A
text: Ellis was my provider, they always do a great job. Professional and neat!!! Highly recommend!!

resp.text: Thank you Ms. Linda for taking the time to provide us a positive review!

name: Bryan Landreth
text: Veterans Lawn Care & Landscapes always exceeds my expectations. Great company, great employees, and phenomenal work. Highly recommend!

resp.text:
Mr. Landreth,
Thank you sir for such an awesome review! This helps more than you know. Hope all is well with you, Shelby and your new little one!

name: Jeffrey Hilt
text: Outstanding job! Happiest my wife has ever been with a lawn care service. Happy wife! Quality service by Tahj, a fellow veteran, at an extraordinarily affordable price   I will recommend them to everyone that I know.

resp.text:
Excellent we are happy to hear this!

-Jacob

name: Alexander Waltenbaugh
text: Jacob and his team are always professional, polite, and trustworthy when it comes to any job. You know they will do the best job the first time!

resp.text:
Alex,
Thank you Sir for your 5 star review and feedback about our team. Mostly,  thank you for your continued service to our country!

name: SkinWalkerz Entertainment
text: Great service and very helpful with me never used a service before and they helped me out

resp.text: Thank you for your 5 Star Review!! I am glad that we were able to help you out and you had a great experience with our team!

name: Vicky Kloock
text: Excellent work, on time, on schedule and within budget!  Very professional staff to work with!  This company exceeded our expectations.  Highly recommend Veteran’s Lawn Care and Landscaping!

resp.text: Thank you, it was a privilege to serve at His house!!

name: Scott B
text:
They were supposed to show between 1pm and 3pm. My spouse put off what she was doing because this is the time they specified. They no-showed. When my wife called for an explanation, the lady told her that she will get a call back with an explanation. Don't bother, because there isn't an explanation for no-showing and not calling.

Will stick with who we have been with.

resp.text: Sir, I apologize that you were not contacted about us not being able to show up for an estimate at the scheduled time. We strive to be on time and I understand your frustration due to the lack of communication.

name: Jacob Henson
text: Very professional and knowledgeable. I would recommend this company with confidence.

resp.text: Thanks Jake! I really appreciate you taking the time, especially with your extraordinary travel agenda, to leave us a  review!

name: John Phillips
text: Ellis did a phenomenal job. Will be using them again.

resp.text: Mr. Phillips, we appreciate your review and I am glad we were able to provide you with an exceptional job!

name: Paul Scott
text:
1) Guy who answered my initial call didn’t realize he’d already answered, and I heard him angrily cursing yet another phone call before he greeted me.
2) Hired this company for a bi-weekly service. Said they did my area on Friday only, and they didn’t do make-ups for rain. Ok, cool.
3) They never showed. First Friday, no rain, no mow. Second Friday, no rain, no mow. They didn’t get a third Friday.
4) Gave 2 stars for being vet owned

resp.text:
Mr. Scott,

I am unsure if you have the correct company. I checked our system and cannot find your name. There is other companies with a deceiving similar name as ours in Huntsville. We also have designated days for rain makeups as well. If you could please give us a call and we can discuss any issues you may have.

Thank you sir!

Jacob Leavitt
Owner, Veteran's Lawn Care & Landscaping
Office: 256-812-9029

name: Chris Nimmo
text: Just bought a new home in Athens and needed help getting the landscaping and yard squared away. Called a few of the top rated companies on google and could not get a call back. Then Tahj and Pedro rolled by the house one day and handed me a pamphlet. I called them up and Mike responded quickly. Amanda at the office made the scheduling and transaction a breeze. Tahj and Dan started work promptly the day of the project and hammered out most of the clean out before lunch. After lunch Eric and Pedro joined the team and the entire crew finished the job. In 10 hours they had completely cleaned out and dug-up/removed the weeds and 12 over grown bushes from the front, back, and side beds, removed 5 stumps, cleaned out an over grown play area and had taken out 2 dying trees. By night fall, they had the yard mulched and ready for phase 2 - replanting in the spring. The following morning Tahj dropped by to mow the grass and edge the entire property, just as he had promised. You can tell Tahj gave a damn, and treated the place like his own. Eric brought the knowledge and had no problem answering my questions about plants and things while they worked. Pedro kept them honest, while Dan provided the laughs. As a veteran I appreciated that from all the guys. The price was fair for the work performed and worth every penny to us. Thank you guys for your service and for the service. Look forward to the next few phases in the coming months.

resp.text:
Mr. Nimmo, thank you so much for this review! I appreciate you taking the time to go into detail how hard our teams work in the field and in operations. These guys deserve the recognition and our customers deserve the best service possible! Thank you for your military service and sacrifice! We are happy to have another awesome customer to provide services to.
-Jacob Leavitt

name: Shane Keirns
text: Management is very easy to work with. They were quick to fix billing errors.

resp.text: Thank you for your review!

name: Dark Alpha
text: They have always been on time and overall reliable. The staff are courteous and knowledgeable.

name: Laurel Brown
text: They responded quickly and professionally and were very reasonably priced. Tahj did an excellent job!

resp.text: Thank you for your review! I will make sure and tell the team!

name: Joan Sargent

resp.text: Mr. Snodgrass, thank you for this review! You have been an extraordinary customer and we appreciate all the referrals you have given us!!

text: Been with them 2 years or so. Great people, reliable service, excellent prices.

resp.text: Mr. Schmidt,  thank you for your review on our lawn care team. We look forward to your landscape project!
